<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o wgpluck.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Instrument #1. instr 1 icps = 220 iamp = 20000 kpick = 0.5 iplk = 0 idamp = 10 ifilt = 1000
axcite oscil 1, 1, 1 apluck wgpluck icps, iamp, kpick, iplk, idamp, ifilt, axcite
out apluck endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Table #1, a sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1
; Play Instrument #1 for two seconds. i 1 0 2 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
